fields.name: Evie Camo
fields.description:
The Evie Camo Backpack is the ultimate bag you need in your life. Camo print entwined in pinks and purples with pops of blue. This backpack is designed in the standard unisex shape and design, perfect for everyone. Finished with a front mini pocket, grab handle, embossed zips, branded inside lining. The padded straps make carrying the backpack comfortable.

Spacious main zipped compartment
External front zippered pocket
Adjustable padded straps and back for comfort
Grab handle

Measurements: H42 x W30 x D12cm
Capacity: 18 litres
Material: 100% Polyester

fields.name: Black Speckle
fields.description:
The backpack you already know you need, the Hype Black Speckle Fade Backpack. In a monochrome colour palette in our signature fade with a speckle print overlay, this is the perfect unisex backpack. Don’t stop here, grab the matching lunch bag, pencil case, wallet and sliders to complete the back to school set. Measuring at 42cms x 30cms x 12cms, creating the ultimate essential item transporter. Finished with a front mini pocket, grab handle, embossed zips, branded inside lining and the iconic Hype crest badge in monochrome on the front. The straps offer supreme comfort with just the right amount of padding.

External front zip pocket
Adjustable padded straps and back for comfort
Grab handle
Faux leather badge with woven logo branding
Measurements: H42 x W30 x D12cm
Capacity: 18 litres
Material: 100% Polyester

fields.name: Black Odyssey
fields.description:
This classic backpack from Hype has been designed in their standard backpack shape in an all-over multicoloured print. Made from 100% polyester, the backpack is finished with an embroidered Hype crest logo to the front. There is a spacious main zippered compartment and a smaller front pocket with a rubber zip puller. The adjustable straps offer supreme comfort with just the right amount of padding.

Spacious large main compartment
Smaller front zippered pocket
Adjustable padded straps and back for comfort
Grab handle
Hype branding to front
Measurements: H42 x W30 x D12cm
Capacity: 18 litres
Material: 100% Polyester

fields.name: Graphite Grey
fields.description:
If you’re after a stylish backpack that will carry all of your stuff, be comfortable and have the quality you can depend on then look no further!

• Dedicated 15″ padded laptop compartment
• Two large main compartments
• Ergonomic S-curve shoulder straps
• Front utility pocket with organiser
• Fully padded back panel
• Side water bottle pocket
• Pleated front stash pocket
• Zippered front stash pocket
• Web haul handle

Measurements: H43 x W33 x D25cm
Capacity: 34 litres
Material: 100% Polyester

fields.name: Tropic Dream
fields.description:
Time-tested, the 33-litre backpack gets high marks for back-to-school-utility. The roomy design features four distinct compartments including a large main compartment with a padded laptop sleeve and room for books and binders. A handy insulated pocket keeps lunch and snacks cool, while a mix of organiser pockets keeps school-day essentials easy to grab. It’s available in a wide range of prints and colours to suit everyone’s taste.

• S-curved back panel and shoulder straps
• Adjustable sternum strap
• Padded 17″ laptop sleeve
• Organizer pocket
• Fleece lined sunglass pocket
• Insulated cooler pocket
• Mesh side pockets
• Padded bottom panel

Measurements: H52 x W33 x D20cm
Material: 600D Polyester
Capacity: 33 Litres

fields.name: Rolltop Backpack – Teal
fields.description:
Simple in style but full of upgraded features, the Rolltop Backpack builds on the unique look of a rolled top to create a backpack that can handle it all. The adjustable sternum strap pairs with ergonomic shoulder straps to ensure a comfortable fit, and the interior laptop compartment makes it easy to bring your gear on the go. The rolled top features a two-way clip closure to secure the opening on each side, and an exterior zip pocket allows for simple organisation. This backpack is made with 100% nylon.

• Spacious zippered main compartment
• 15″ internal laptop sleeve
• Vertical zippered front pocket
• Ergonomic padded shoulder straps for greater comfort
• Adjustable sternum strap to keep your pack in the proper position and help ease the load
• Rolltop two-way clip closure allows easy access whilst keeping everything secure
• Top carry handle

Measurements: H62 x W45.5 x D14cm
Capacity: 25 Litres
Material: 100% Nylon

fields.name: Retreat Backpack – Gargoyle
fields.description:
The Retreat backpack is a streamlined rendition of a timeless mountaineering style, featuring a drawcord cinch closure and a strap detailed top flap.

• Signature striped fabric liner
• Spacious main compartment with adjustable drawstring closure
• Padded and fleece lined 15″ laptop sleeve
• Magnetic strap closures with metal pin clips
• Internal media pocket with headphone hole
• Small sleeve pocket to front
• Premium synthetic leather straps
• Contoured, padded and adjustable shoulder straps
• Classic woven label

Measurements: H43 x W30.5 x D15cm
Capacity: 19.5 Litres

fields.name: Rain Backpack – Navy
fields.description:
Rucksack is a city staple, perfect for commutes on bike or foot. The look is characterised by a tactile strap, signature carabiner and rolltop opening. The waterproof bag also features a side-access laptop pocket, front zip pocket and padded back panel. Cycle-ready features include a front D-ring – ideal for holding bike locks – and a buckle fastened chest strap for a secure ride-proof fit.

• Opening with snap compression
• Signature carabiner closure
• Single main compartment
• Front pocket with coated zip
• Padded air-mesh back panel
• Side-access laptop pocket fits 16” device
• Adjustable padded back straps
• Webbing carry handle
• Adjustable chest strap

Measurements: H48 x W32 x D11cm
Material: 100% polyester with polyurethane coating
Weight: 835g
Capacity: 13 Litres

fields.name: Cosmo Backpack – Night Tropical
fields.description:
The Cosmo is lower volume daypack combining organisation and function in a compact and stylish design. This sleek pack will keep you organised on the go thanks to the front pocket with dedicated storage for utensils, keys, cords and your phone. Larger standalone items have a home in the separate main compartment.

• Spacious zippered main compartment
• Internal zipped pocket
• Large zip around front pocket
• Large slide in pocket
• Smaller slide in pocket
• Zipped mesh pocket
• 3 pen slots
• Large zippered mesh pocket on opening lid
• Key clip
• Adjustable shoulder straps
• Top carry handle

Measurements: H30 x W23 x D8cm
Capacity: 6.5 Litres
Material: Polyester

fields.name: Mini Backpack – Copen Blue
fields.description:
The original backpack made mini. The classic mini backpack is a simple design, sized down for essentials-only days in the city.

• Signature striped fabric liner
• Zippered main compartment
• Front zippered storage pocket
• Prusik cord zipper pulls
• Adjustable slim shoulder straps
• Classic woven label

Measurements: H28 x W20 x D11cm
Capacity: 6.5 Litres

fields.name: Coast Cabin Suitcase – Antique Gold
fields.description:
Ample storage for all your essentials, useful adjustable straps, organisational pockets and a beautiful striped lining, this suitcase is the perfect choice to aid easy journeys.

This cabin case is not only super stylish but fantastically functional, ultra-lightweight and durable. Its streamlined design and four smooth rolling double-wheels aids manoeuvrability. The thoughtful design details ensure packing is straightforward and use is stress-free.

Perfect for overnight stays and weekends away. Also, you’ll be pleased to know this case is cabin compliant with all popular airlines. No more worrying about the size of your case at the last minute.

• Practical contemporary design boasts four double   branded hare logo wheels
• Aircraft grade aluminium trolley system
• Expandable midriff allows for all those holiday purchases
• Brushed nickel heritage logo hare proudly adorns the top pockets
• The trolley system is enclosed within a zippered pocket which gives added protection in transit
• Practical striped compression straps helps slim down the case when full
• A stitched Coast branding patch, contrast zip pulls and a distinctive Breton stripe lining in 100% 
  recycled material
• The outer fabric is a highly durable soft side micro twill fabric
• Five years manufacturer’s guarantee

Measurements: H54 x W37 x D25cm
Capacity: 40 Litres
Weight: 2.7kg
Material: Micro Twill Fabric

fields.name: Coast Large Suitcase – French Navy
fields.description:
Ample storage for all your essentials, useful adjustable straps, organisational pockets and a beautiful striped lining, this suitcase is the perfect choice to aid easy journeys. Whether it’s a trip to the in-laws, a staycation or somewhere a little further, this suitcase ticks all the boxes.

This ultra-lightweight durable suitcase has four smooth rolling double-wheels that aid manoeuvrability, perfect for last minute dashes to the checkout desk.

• Practical contemporary design boasts four double branded hare logo wheels
• Aircraft grade aluminium trolley system
• Expandable midriff allows for all those holiday purchase
• Brushed nickel heritage logo hare proudly adorns the top pockets
• The trolley system is enclosed within a zippered pocket which gives added protection in transit
• Practical striped compression straps helps slim down the case when full
• Top & Side padded carry handles
• A stitched Coast branding patch, contrast zip pulls and a distinctive Breton stripe lining in 100% recycled material
• The outer fabric is a highly durable soft side micro twill fabric
• Five years manufacturer’s guarantee

Measurements: H76 x W50 x D33cm
Capacity: 105 Litres
Weight: 4.1kg
Material: Micro Twill Fabric

fields.name: 2 Day Assault Backpack – Forest
fields.description:
The 2 Day is nod to the ultra-success of the 3-Day Assault Pack. Retaining the aesthetics of the original 3-Day Assault, the latest version is a scaled down version for your everyday urban missions. Its signature 3-Zip design provides ready access to the pack’s contents.

The new 2 Day is a scaled-down option for non-military enthusiasts built into a smaller, everyday urban size and functionality. Enough molle on sides and back of pack to entertain substitutions from flash-bang pocket attachments to urban necessities. All the bells and whistles you would expect in a 3-DAP with the integrated floating computer sleeve for a non-combative lifestyle.

• Classic 3-ZIP design for easy, rapid access to the interior
• Two zippered lid pockets
• Velcro pile on top of lid for morale patches
• Interior dump pockets
• Adjustable yoke
• Main compartment and side zip access to floating, padded sleeve that fits laptops up to 38cm (15″) and document/tablet sleeve pocket
• Two interior mesh pockets
• Full-length plastic frame sheet
• Removable web waist belt
• Compression straps
• Molle on exterior

Measurements: H53 x W30 x D28cm
Material: 500D CORDURA fabric
Weight: 1.4kg
Capacity: 27 Litres

fields.name: Skate Backpack – Grey Heather
fields.description:
When skateboarding is life, the Billabong Command Skate Backpack has you covered. Featuring straps for your board, this durable backpack is built with a large main compartment, vertical zip pocket, interior laptop sleeve, mesh drink side pocket and padded shoulder straps for a comfortable wear.

Large main compartment with a double zip-fastening pocket
Padded iPad sleeve
Large zippered mesh pocket on opening
3 slip pockets
Pen loop
Separate access padded 15″ laptop compartment
Vertical front zipped pocket for easy access to essentials
Exterior buckle skateboard straps
Outer helment loop
Two side pockets for water bottles and accessories
Adjustable air-padded mesh shoulder straps
Reinforced padded back panel
Adjustable Sternum strap
Suregrip base
Woven branded logo to front

Measurements: H45.5 x W33.5 x D18cm
Capacity: 26 litres
Material: Recycled Polyester

fields.name: Mohave Backpack – Midnight Navy
fields.description:
Large main zipped compartment with dual zippers
Padded 15″ laptop sleeve with loop tape closure
Front zipped pocket for storing those everyday essentials
Two small zippered side pockets
Fleece lined zippered sunglasses pocket on top
Stowable front skateboard straps
Ergonomic padded shoulder straps
3D air-mesh back panel for extra comfort
Adjustable sternum system
Tree logo applique and woven branding to front

Measurements: H46 x W28 x D21cm
Material: Polyester
Capacity: 30 Litres

fields.name: Segmented Backpack – Black
fields.description:
The SEG30 is the only bag you’ll need for anything from epic days to short trips. The innovative segmented design spawns efficient organisation and quick access to every compartment. This bag will change how you think about packing.

Maximum organisation meets minimalist design. Access the full 30 litre capacity through the segmented zipper pockets or alternatively through the oversized clamshell pocket. Organise your belongings by type, by day, or even by activity. Separate larger items or dirty clothes between the segments and the main compartment. In addition the SEG30 offers an externally accessible padded laptop sleeve and water bottle pocket.

SEG30 keeps you organised during travel, with all of your items conveniently accessible from the outside of the bag. Light to carry, fast to access, and the perfect size for short trips and epic days.

The SEG30 will revolutionise the way you pack. Experience freedom from packing cubes, laundry bags, and other redundant features. The innovative organisation system is specifically designed for lightweight, and efficient travel.

30 litre capacity (carry on compliant, most airlines)
4 Segments for organisation by type, day, or size
Full access clamshell for large or dirty items like shoes and laundry
External zipper access to all pockets, find things instantly
Exterior access padded laptop pocket
Zipper water bottle pocket
Built from waterproof, high durability materials
Sealing zippers, PU coated
Rugged carry handles on top, bottom, and side
Sternum strap, detachable
Hypalon tie down points and touch points

Measurements: H47 x W24 x D24cm
Material: 420D nylon outer low wear panels, UTS waterproofing, 100D Robic® Dynatec weave interior liners/dividers, UTS waterproofing
Weight: 690g
Capacity: 30 Litres

fields.name: Trailhead 65 Backpack – Blue
fields.description:
The Trailhead 65 has an updated design with all the great benefits we’ve seen before, plus some new tricks. For extra comfort, the customisable BIOFIT™ back system has enhanced padding, while its adjustable chest straps combine with top tension straps to achieve a supportive fit, for every shape.

As for space, the 65 litre capacity offers plenty of room and it’s packed with pockets and attachment points so you’ll never be short of storage for all your essentials. You can even keep your kit mud-free with a separate bivi compartment to separate the ready-to-wear from the ready-to-wash!

Enjoy a back-hugging fit thanks to a supportive pre-curved hip belt
Stay hydrated on the go as it’s hydration system-compatible
Longer lasting YKK® zips for durable performance
Keep essentials dry with a handy rain cover
Great fit from top tension straps with height adjustable take-off points
Feel the comfort of BIOFIT™ back length adjustment
Keep things to hand with attachment points on the lid
Never be short of a drink thanks to bottle pockets
Stash essentials in the top lid pocket
Be prepared whatever the terrain with walking pole attachments
A range of fully adjustable straps means you can get a unique fit to match your shape, so your load feels lighter and comfier
Keep dry gear dry and wet gear far away with a separated compartment
Whether trekking or travelling there, versatility is key. With 65 litres packed with pockets and attachment points, you can’t go wrong

Measurements: H77 x W44 x D30cm
Capacity: 65 litres
Weight: 1.7kg
Material: Esdura 600D

fields.name: Scree 32 Backpack – Del Mar
fields.description:
A spacious daypack or light, overnight backpack. From ambitious day trips to austere overnighters, the Scree has you covered. It’s quick and easy to dial in the fit on this workhorse rucksack.

This mid-size, technical daypack offers ready access to your hiking kit via our signature, 3 zip design. The Scree is a versatile pack with an ideal capacity for most of your outdoor adventures. Long days require ample water, so the Scree is both hydration compatible as well as offering easy-to-reach water bottle pockets. For smaller essentials you want to keep organised, there’s a spacious zippered pocket built into the lid of the pack.

Internal HDPE frame sheet for rigidity and support
Features a removable, Redirect waist belt system that secures in a natural, forward pull direction that requires less effort to tighten
Patented Futura Yoke easily micro adjusts to the torso length allowing the proper amount of stand-off between the back and frame
Featuring our classic 3-ZIP design for easy, rapid access to the interior
Zippered lid pocket to organise essentials
Zippered pockets on waist belt
Water bottle pockets keep hydration handy
Hydration reservoir compatible
Double-layered bottom for long-haul durability.
YKK® zippers

Measurements: H64 x W36 x D29cm
Material: 210D Robic nylon fabric
Weight: 1.3kg
Capacity: 32 Litres
